tool_description: Validates caller identity through various authentication methods to determine access level and routing permissions.

authentication_method.description: Method used for authentication: phone_verification, account_number, security_questions, or pin

provided_credentials.description: Array of credential values provided by caller

error_messages: Invalid authentication method: Must be one of [phone_verification, account_number, security_questions, pin].
Authentication failed: Provided credentials do not match customer records.
Account locked: Customer account is temporarily locked due to multiple failed attempts.
Missing credentials: Required authentication information not provided.
usage: Provide caller_id, phone_number, authentication_method, and optionally account_number and provided_credentials to validate caller identity.

authentication_level.description: Level of authentication achieved (none, basic, full)
